titles.title: Let Your Spirit Rise Up In Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let Your Spirit rise up in me.
Let Your Spirit rise up in me
And set my feet a dancing, and my heart rejoicing,
And my mouth singing out Your praise.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You alone are great God and worthy to be praised.
You alone are great God and worthy to be praised.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let Your Spirit rise up in me.
Let Your Spirit rise up in me
And set my feet a dancing, and my heart rejoicing,
And my mouth singing out Your praise.
